products.name: Basic To Advance in React
products.overview: A complete guide to learning React from beginner to advanced level.
products.long_descrption: This course covers everything from the basics of React, including components, state, and props, to advanced topics like hooks, context API, performance optimization, and routing. Perfect for developers who want to build dynamic and modern web applications using React.

products.name: Django Framework for Beginners
products.overview: Start building web apps using Django, the powerful Python framework.
products.long_description: This beginner-friendly course teaches the fundamentals of Django, including models, views, templates, forms, and authentication. Ideal for those who want to create secure and scalable web applications using Python.

products.name: Mastering Node.js
products.overview: Master backend development with Node.js and build fast, scalable apps.
products.long_description: Learn how to use Node.js for server-side development, working with file systems, databases, and APIs. This course covers asynchronous programming, Express.js, and RESTful API creation with real-world projects.

products.name: Python for Data Science
products.overview: A complete guide to Data Science with Python.
products.long_descrption: Explore Python fundamentals and libraries like Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, and Seaborn. This course guides you through data cleaning, visualization, and basic machine learning workflows in Python.

products.name: Vue.js Fundamentals
products.overview: Learn Vue.js and build interactive web apps.
products.long_descrption: Get hands-on with Vue.js basics, including components, directives, forms, and routing. Perfect for frontend developers who want to quickly build dynamic user interfaces with Vue.

products.name: Angular-The Complete Guide
products.overview: Comprehensive Angular course to build modern web applications.
products.long_descrption: Learn Angular from scratch including TypeScript, components, directives, services, and forms. Build powerful web apps and master advanced topics like routing, RxJS, and state management.

products.name: Java Programming Essentials
products.long_descrption: This course covers Java basics such as variables, loops, arrays, classes, and OOP principles. Designed for beginners looking to build strong programming foundations using Java.

products.name: Spring Boot & Microservices
products.overview: Develop microservices with Spring Boot and cloud tools
products.long_descrption: Learn how to create production-ready Spring Boot applications with REST APIs, security, and database integration. Understand microservice architecture using Spring Cloud and Docker.

products.name: Flutter for Mobile App Development
products.long_descrption: From setup to deployment, this course walks through building Flutter apps for Android and iOS. Covers widgets, navigation, state management, and Firebase integration.

products.name: Machine Learning with Python
products.overview: Explore machine learning concepts and projects using Python.
products.long_descrption: Dive into supervised and unsupervised learning using libraries like Scikit-learn and TensorFlow. This course includes real-world ML projects and evaluation techniques for model performance..

products.name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
products.overview: Learn cybersecurity basics and ethical hacking.
products.long_descrption: Learn about network security, ethical hacking, firewalls, encryption, and threat detection. Ideal for beginners seeking foundational knowledge in cybersecurity.

products.name: Blockchain Essentials
products.overview: Introduction to blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies.
products.long_descrption: Gain a foundational understanding of how blockchain works, its components, consensus algorithms, and how cryptocurrencies and smart contracts are developed.

products.name: SQL & Database Management
products.overview: Master SQL queries and database design.
products.long_descrption: Covers the basics of relational databases, SQL commands (SELECT, INSERT, JOIN), normalization, and schema design. Includes practice with MySQL and real-world database scenarios.

products.name: Data Structures & Algorithms
products.overview: Optimize coding skills with DSA techniques.
products.long_descrption: Learn essential data structures like arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, graphs, and master algorithm techniques including sorting, searching, dynamic programming, and recursion. Perfect for coding interviews and competitive programming.

products.name: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
products.overview: Create stunning designs with UX principles.
products.long_descrption: This course introduces the basics of user interface and experience design. Learn wireframing, prototyping, design thinking, color theory, typography, and user research to create intuitive and aesthetically pleasing digital experiences.

featured_products.overview: Learn cybersecurity basics and ethical hacking.
